sentences.en: a pair of tennis shorts
sentences.cn: 一条网球短裤

sentences.en: Everyone dressed informally in shorts or jeans.
sentences.cn: 大家都穿得很休闲，不是穿了短裤就是穿了牛仔裤。

sentences.en: He was wearing a blue silk singlet and boxer shorts.
sentences.cn: 他穿着一件蓝色丝绸背心和平脚短裤。

sentences.en: He was wearing shorts which showed his long, muscular, hairy legs.
sentences.cn: 他穿着短裤，露出自己强壮多毛的长腿。

sentences.en: He wears a pair of shorts.
sentences.cn: 他穿着一条短裤.

sentences.en: I like your shorts, Jake.
sentences.cn: 杰克， 我喜欢你的短裤。

sentences.en: I pointed to my shorts and trotted on.
sentences.cn: 于是我指了指我的短裤，继续向前跑去。

sentences.en: I pulled my shorts on and ran outside.
sentences.cn: 我套上短裤就跑了出去.

sentences.en: I will be needing a new pair of shorts soon.
sentences.cn: 我很快就需要一条新短裤.

sentences.en: Ifyou run where there are a lot of other runners, try this game: Pick outa specific article of clothing, such as black running shorts, to lookfor during your run.
sentences.cn: 如果你跑步的地方有很多跑步者，试试这个游戏：挑选一件特别的衣服，比如黑色运动短裤，然后在跑步的过程中找到它。

sentences.en: Michael groaned and readjusted his shorts.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔一边发着牢骚一边整了整自己的短裤。

sentences.en: Now I have a cool pair of shorts for riding.
sentences.cn: 现在我就有了一条骑车时的酷酷短裤啦！

sentences.en: She pulled her shorts up and put a T - shirt on.
sentences.cn: 她穿上短裤,套上T 恤衫.

sentences.en: She was dressed in a halter top and shorts.
sentences.cn: 她穿着三角背心和短裤。

sentences.en: Something was sticking from the pocket of the little man's grimy shorts.
sentences.cn: 小个子男人脏乎乎的短裤口袋里鼓鼓的，伸出来个什么东西。

sentences.en: The doctor told me to strip down to my shorts.
sentences.cn: 医生让我脱得只剩一条短裤.

sentences.en: There are a couple of shorts on before the main film.
sentences.cn: 主片开映之前有几部短片.

sentences.en: There was so much blood it had soaked through my boxer shorts.
sentences.cn: 血流得太多，渗透了我的平脚短裤。

sentences.en: This shop sells the latest fashion of shirts and shorts.
sentences.cn: 这个店在卖最新流行的衬衫和短裤。

sentences.en: Where are my shorts?
sentences.cn: 我的短裤在哪里？

sentences.en: Women athletes wear cropped tops and tight shorts.
sentences.cn: 女运动员穿着短上衣和紧身短裤。
